about_the_game:
Dive into the chaos of PEST APOCALYPSE - A horde survival game where your mission is to deliver steaming hot pizza to hungry customers in a world infested with even hungrier pests!



Skillfully race your vehicle through a treacherous landscape! Get rewarded for timely deliveries, collect XP by killing pests and become stronger by upgrading your vehicle and leveling up your team!

KEY FEATURES

  • SHORT BURSTS OF FUN: Quick runs that take ~12 minutes to complete!
  • PIZZA DELIVERY SURVIVAL: There is more to this than just surviving, you have a job to do!
  • VEHICULAR PLAYGROUND: Physics-based simulation for the best driving feel and fun!
  • CUSTOMIZATION: Try various combinations of vehicles, survivors and modifications! Adapt and experiment to find what works best for the situation at hand!
  • PEST CONTROL: Feel powerful as you slaughter an endless horde of disgusting pests!
  • PROGRESSION: Use your in-game earnings to unlock new vehicles, weapons and more!
  • 2D + 3D: The charm of pixelated 2D sprites in a low poly 3D environment!

The demo is (currently) in pre-alpha state with some planned features awaiting implementation in the near future.
You CAN play with a keyboard, but we HIGHLY RECOMMEND playing with a gamepad as it is the input we've mainly focused on thus far.

short_description: Post-Apocalyptic pizza delivery survival on wheels! Assemble a team of heavily armed survivors, smash through buildings and pull off ridiculous nitro-boosted stunts - whatever it takes to plow through the horde and feed the wasteland!
